name: Enotria: The Last Song
storyline:
The Universe is a Story, which unfolds and weaves the ever-changing tapestry, making up Reality Itself, Until a group of extraordinary individuals, used the power of the Story to trap it on paper – creating the Canovaccio.
The world has since degraded, becoming an empty – yet beautiful – husk…
summary: Enotria: The Last Song is an Action RPG Souls-Like set in a fantasy world based off Italian folklore and culture.
